solution_line_template: If Raj has eaten {raj_eaten} bananas in the basket, he has {raj_remaining_multiplier}*{raj_eaten} = <<{raj_eaten}*{raj_remaining_multiplier}={raj_remaining}>>{raj_remaining} bananas.
The total number of bananas that Raj cut from the tree is {raj_remaining}+{raj_eaten} = <<{raj_remaining}+{raj_eaten}={total_cut}>>{total_cut}
On the tree initially were {bananas_left}+{total_cut}=<<{bananas_left}+{total_cut}={initial_bananas}>>{initial_bananas} bananas.
